title: Harold Macmillan
summary: Maurice Harold Macmillan, 1st Earl of Stockton, OM, PC, FRS (10 February 1894 – 29 December 1986) was a British Conservative politician who was Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1957 to 1963.[1] Caricatured as "Supermac", he was known for his pragmatism, wit and unflappability.
